song.title: Freedom, Metal & Might
song.info:
Born to stand against the wind, to struggle on my own Against the countless masses I will fight until I'm gone Blackened, betrayed, tortured, forgotten and alone A thousand lies I've faced, but I will bow to none
They hate me for what I am, unsubdued and free With cunning, stealth and might, I will not kneel
I sing of freedom, metal and might Freedom, metal and might When invaders come to kill us all, only agents dare to fight To fight for freedom, metal and might
My mind is in turmoil, my eyes are burning bright Through devouring rage and anger, I'm getting ready to fight The desperate cries of fallen brothers still echo in my head Fooled by the lies of those in command till the price of blood was paid
The sceptics and the tyrants will claim we're bound to fail But with burning will and power we will prevail
